name: Motion

description: The various fans used in the printer

name: Temperature Sensors
description: The various temperature sensors used in the printer

components.description: A standard 3950 thermistor mounted in the top of the bed

components.name: Keenovo
components.description: The secondary 3950 thermistor in the Keenovo heater

components.name: pt100 & daughterboard
components.description: A pt100 and daughterboard connected to the duet 2 for the hotend

name: Macros
description: Various Macros that can be used to increase the functionality of Klipper

components.name: Homing
components.description: A marco that homes all 3 axis, levels the bed, and re-homes the Z

components.name: Go Home
components.description: A simple macro that sends the print head to x=0, y=0

components.name: Go Center
components.description: A simple macro that sends the print head to to the center of the print area

components.name: Go Park
components.description: A simple macro that sends the print head to X & Y max
